t: Tea & Company – Mighty Leaf Tea Canada
s: Mighty Leaf began as Tea & Company, a boutique tea house in San Francisco. Since 1996, it has been our passion to share the whole leaf tea experience with tea lovers around the world.

September 16, 2024 - The Mighty Leaf Tea Company is a specialty tea manufacturer and distributor based in Emeryville, California. It was founded in 1996 by Gary Shinner and Jill Portman. In August 2014, Mighty Leaf Tea was acquired by Peet's Coffee & Tea, which is owned by JAB Holding Company.
